net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: dnd5e_CharSheet_formatProperty
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.toolTip:
To be used in liue of getProperty. Ensures that when a property is empty (""), a non-breaking space character is returned. This helps to anchor fields that might otherwise collapse down.
arg (0) = Property name
arg (1) = (Optional) Boolean - isLiteral - when true (1), the first argument is treated as a literal value instead of a property name
arg (2) = (Optional) Boolean - noNbsp - when true (1), the property value is returned as-is. If the value is empty, that is what will be returned

Returns the property value or   when there is no value
